name: Java Compile and Run

# Run the workflow on every push to any branch
on:
  push:

jobs:
  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    # Step 1: Checkout the code from the repository
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    # Step 2: Set up JDK 11
    - name: Set up JDK 11
      uses: actions/setup-java@v3
      with:
        java-version: '11'
        distribution: 'adopt'

    # Step 3: Compile Java files in src/car/ using javac
    - name: Compile Java files
      run: javac -d out src/car/*.java

    # Step 4: Run the main Java application that processes the files
    - name: Run Java application
      run: java -cp out car.MainClass

    # Optional: If there's a specific output file you want to check, add a step to verify its existence
    - name: Verify Output File
      run: |
        if [ -f "output.txt" ]; then
          echo "Output file created successfully."
        else
          echo "Output file not found."
          exit 1
        fi
